attributes.action: Request the Prime Minister, Theresa May to resign.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister, Theresa May, has shown she is unfit to govern the United Kingdom, and represent the wishes of over 17 million people to remove us from the political union called the EU. We hereby offer our own petition of no-confidence in her, and request she stands down our our Prime Minister.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. This would be a personal decision for the Prime Minister
